title: Emerald Radiance Vaddanam - A Touch of Royal Splendor
materials: Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Hyderabadi Gold Polish ensures long-lasting brilliance.
features: Openwork bangle design with geometric patterns, intricately adorned with CZ stones. Features a stunning rectangular-cut emerald centerpiece, surrounded by a halo of shimmering CZs. The delicate filigree-inspired gold detailing adds a touch of vintage charm.
occasions: and other special occasions. Can also be worn as a statement piece for modern gatherings.
description: This Vaddanam seamlessly blends traditional design with modern aesthetics. The use of a genuine emerald gives it a regal touch, while the CZ detailing adds brilliance and affordability. The Hyderabadi Gold Polish guarantees a lasting shine. A versatile piece that can be passed down through generations as a precious heirloom. The openwork design makes it lightweight and comfortable to wear.
